attributes.action: resign or hold a general election so we the people can actually be in control of who we wish to be our prime minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: enough is enough, resign or call an election, we the petitioners thought our political system allowed us to choose our prime minister, and currently it seems that our prime minister is becoming a dictator as he is not listening to his people...his leaders!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
